---

# ğŸ“Œ Project Overview

**AuraGemini** is a **voice-enabled AI assistant** built using **Google Gemini**, **Streamlit**, and **offline Text-to-Speech**.
It allows users to:

* Ask questions in natural language
* Get intelligent answers generated by Gemini
* Hear responses read aloud by an AI voice assistant
* Enjoy a modern UI with a custom background image

This project demonstrates **Prompt Engineering**, **LLM integration**, **UI customization**, and **Human-AI interaction**.


---

# âš™ï¸ Detailed Workflow (Step-by-Step)

1. **User enters a question** in the Streamlit interface
2. A **retriever function** injects contextual information
3. The query + context are combined into a **prompt**
4. Prompt is sent to **Google Gemini Flash model**
5. Gemini generates a **text response**
6. Response is:

   * Displayed on the screen
   * Read aloud by an **AI voice assistant**
7. The UI runs on a **custom background image** for enhanced UX

# ğŸ§© Libraries & Technologies Used

## ğŸ”¹ Core Libraries

| Library          | Purpose                     |
| ---------------- | --------------------------- |
| **streamlit**    | Web UI framework            |
| **google-genai** | Gemini LLM integration      |
| **pyttsx3**      | Offline text-to-speech      |
| **base64**       | Image encoding for UI       |
| **threading**    | Non-blocking voice playback |

---

## ğŸ”¹ AI Model Used

### âœ… **Gemini Flash (Latest)**

```
models/gemini-flash-latest
```

**Why this model?**

* Fast response time
* Cost-efficient
* Ideal for chat & prompt engineering
* Stable (not experimental)

---

# ğŸ§  Prompt Engineering Strategy

The model receives:

```text
User Question
+ Retrieved Context
+ Instruction to answer clearly
```

This improves:

* Answer relevance
* Reduced hallucinations
* Better explanation quality

---

# ğŸ™ï¸ AI Voice Assistant (Text-to-Speech)

* Uses **pyttsx3** (offline)
* No extra API key required
* Works natively on Windows
* Runs in a separate thread to avoid UI freezing

---

# ğŸ¨ UI & UX Features

* Full-screen **background image**
* Glassmorphism effect on input fields
* Responsive layout
* Spinner during AI processing
* Clear status messages
